function.name: humidificationMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the humidification mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to change the humidification mode.

predefinedHumidificationMode.description: The predefined humidification mode to set (e.g., auto, medium, high, low).
